channel.title: Project Management Classes
channel.description: Recent content on Project Management Classes

item.title: ScrumTemplates
item.description: SCRUM templates This part of the material have SCRUM templates to be used in your repository Wiki. Sprint Planning Templates Daily Meeting Templates

item.title: Brainstorming
item.description: During the next 1h we will work in group in order to gather user stories for the different users of the application. With that aim, we need to: Firstlly, we need to individualy think in specific application requirements based on the group idea presented. We need to group requirements by similarity and build the user stories of our application. For both tasks, we could use the following material:

item.title: Sprint Distribution
item.description: After the workshop, there is also required to deliver the sprint distribution and the initial architecture design. To do that, we provide some template to make your inspiration: Sprint Distirbution Template

item.title: Product Backlog
item.description: This material is required to having a sprint backlog documented before passing the stories to Zenhub. This document will be the result from the “Focus Group Sessions”. Template in Markdown Template in Doc

item.title: Workshop Quiz
item.description: Today, after the workshop, we will play a game just to know your opinion about the workshop and the idea generation. The answers won’t affect your results neither the teachers relationship. It is just to help to improve!!!! After starting the game, we need to install “Kahoot!”! in our devices: Apple Devices Google Play Devices The overall quizz is here: Quizz URL

item.title: HowTo
item.description: This presentation is focused on the methodology to be followed in order to create a presentation. With this regards, we need to know our audience, the theme, highlights of the product/idea and we also need to minimise errors and avoid nervous. Presentation (HTML)

item.title: ScrumHandsOn
item.description: In this session we are going to see how to practically implement SCRUM. Presentation (HTML)

item.title: ScrumSession
item.description: This session is focused on describing and learning SCRUM. For that, we will learn the SCRUM process and the corresponfing people involved, meetings, artifacts and main parts. Presentation (HTML) Presentation and Notes (PDF)

item.title: Agile Methdology
item.description: This section is aimed at explaining the fundamentals of the agile methodology. Presentation (HTML) Presentation and Notes (PDF)
